definition: classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc

sentences.english: One of the ships turned its gun turret on a Japanesereconnaissance plane.
sentences.chinese: 其中一艘艦隻將炮管瞄向日方偵察機。

sentences.english: It took Kurita over three hours to round up his force.
sentences.chinese: 慄田集合他的艦隻，一共花了三個多小時。

sentences.english: American craft were overseas by the end of the war.
sentences.chinese: 到戰爭結束時，共有三百八十三艘美軍艦隻在海外。

sentences.english: The storm beached half the fleet .
sentences.chinese: 風暴使艦隊的半數艦隻擱淺。

sentences.english: Each ship in the task force increased its speed to 25 knots.
sentences.chinese: 特遣艦隊的每一個艦隻都提速至25節。
